Russia: Plague Riot: A crowd of rioters entered Red Square, broke into the Kremlin and destroyed the Chudov Monastery.
Plague Riot: The army suppressed the riot.
Philippine: Moro pirates traveled all over the country and raids many fishing villages in Manila Bay, Mariveles, Parañaque, Pasay and Malate.
India: Marathas re-captures Delhi and parts of North India.
China: The Putuo Zongcheng Temple was completed.
Chile: The Franciscan order assumes the religious functions of the Jesuits in Chiloé.
Belgium: Privy Council grants necessary permits for artillery general Joseph de Ferraris to chart Mechelen and Brabant.
